title: 98/612/CFSP: Council Decision of 26 October 1998 amending Common Position 96/635/CFSP on Burma/Myanmar
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 26 October 1998 amending Common Position 96/635/CFSP on Burma/Myanmar (98/612/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Common Position 96/635/CFSP is hereby extended until 29 April 1999.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 26 October 1998.
For the Council
The President
W. SCHĂSSEL
(1) OJ L 287, 8. 11. 1996, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 32, 6. 2. 1998, p. 13.
(3) OJ L 138, 9. 5. 1998, p. 5.
